General.Name: Global Ship Lease Inc
General.Description: Global Ship Lease, Inc. owns and charters containerships under fixed-rate charters to container shipping companies. As of March 10, 2023, it owned 65 mid-sized and smaller containerships with an aggregate capacity of 342,348 twenty-foot equivalent units. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 25 Wilton Road, London, United Kingdom, SW1V 1LW
